name: OMNA
description: OMNA for Shopify. Sell Anywhere, Manage On One

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy1 && npm run deploy2
scripts.deploy1: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*' --include '*.js' --include '*.html' build/ s3://omna-v1m2rx
scripts.deploy2: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete --exclude '*.js' --size-only build/ s3://omna-v1m2rx
scripts.deploy-back: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile cenit-io --delete build/ s3://omna-v1m2rx && npm run invalidate
